StringTable.Label: AltarianProphecy_Mission1_Dec
StringTable.String: Lead the newly founded Terran Alliance as it encounters the Altarian Confederation for the first time and takes its first steps in founding an alliance that will shape the galaxy's future.

StringTable.Label: AltarianProphecy_Mission1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lead the newly founded Terran Alliance as it encounters the Altarian Confederation for the first time and takes its first steps in founding an alliance that will shape the galaxy's future.

StringTable.Label: AltarianProphecy_Mission1_CaptureVol_Message
StringTable.String: Drive the Korx out of the sector

StringTable.Label: AltarianProphecy_Mission2_Dec
StringTable.String: The Terran Alliance works to form its first lasting alliance with a galactic power. Yet, another power has come onto the scene, the Drengin Empire. Newly promoted D.L. Bradley must do whatever it takes to make the Korx stop their unprovoked war with the Altarians before the Drengin get involved.

StringTable.Label: AltarianProphecy_Mission2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: The Terran Alliance works to form its first lasting alliance with a galactic power. Yet, another power has come onto the scene, the Drengin Empire. Newly promoted D.L. Bradley must do whatever it takes to make the Korx stop their unprovoked war with the Altarians before the Drengin get involved.

StringTable.Label: AltarianProphecy_Mission3_Dec
StringTable.String: The devastating war with the Dominion of the Korx has come to an end, only to reveal an even more deadly enemy lurking in the shadows. Now the newly allied Terran and Altarian forces must confront the secretive race that has tried so hard to destroy them both.

StringTable.Label: AltarianProphecy_Mission3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: The devastating war with the Dominion of the Korx has come to an end, only to reveal an even more deadly enemy lurking in the shadows.
